name: The Anthology
description:
How long can you survive the ant-ics and politics of the nest?

Lead a colony of ants in this Reigns-inspired game where you take control of the Queen Ant. Make decisions on matters your subjects present, trying to keep your resources balanced and your colony healthy. Can you ant-icipate what challenges you will face?

There are victory conditions, though you can simply aim to live for as long as possible!

This game was made over the course of 3 days.
